mapper.select: select e.id as id, e.account as account, e.credit as credit, e.credittype as creditType, e.channeltype as channelType, e.iscomplete as isComplete, e.createtime as createTime from credit e where e.account = #{account} and e.credittype = #{creditType}
mapper.insert: insert into credit(id, account, credit, credittype, channeltype, iscomplete, createtime) values(#{id}, #{account}, #{credit}, #{creditType}, #{channelType}, #{isComplete}, #{createTime})
